title: Sketchbook Folio, "Countryside with Haystacks, House and Trees", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Field with haystacks in right foreground. House in distance at left, with one tree at right and a few trees at left. Additional stands of trees on horizon at right, and mountains at left in far distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Countryside with Haystacks, House and Trees", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-27.
